name: Commonwealth ex rel. White, Appellant, v. Myers
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. White v. Myers

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. White, Appellant, v. Myers.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Petitioner’s claim is foreclosed by Johnson v. New Jersey, 384 U.S. 719, 86 S. Ct. 1772 (1966). Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John T. White, appellant, in propria persona.
Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. White, Appellant, v. Myers.
January 4, 1967:
Submitted November 14, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
John T. White, appellant, in propria persona.
Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
